model.linkTitle: Comic books. Marvel Super Special, vol. 1, no. 25, Rock & Rule, 1983.
model.artifactTitle: Comic books. Marvel Super Special, vol. 1, no. 25, Rock & Rule, 1983.
model.artifactDescription:
Marvel Super Special, vol. 1, no. 25, Rock & Rule, 1983. This comic book contains an adaptation of the film , along with articles on the making of the film, the music of the film, and production stills.

The cover of the book features an illustration of several characters from the film, along with the text "" Marvel Super Special / The Official Adaptation / of the Feature-Length Animated Rock 'n' Roll Fantasy from Nelvana! / Plus: Articles, Interviews and Artwork from the Movie.""The book includes a special section on the making of the film.
